metadata.source: Eugen Hultzsch: Kalidasa's Meghaduta, ed. from Manuscripts with the commentary of Vallabhadeva. London: Royal Asiatic Society 1911 (Prize Publication Fund ; 4)

children.text: tasminn adrau kati cid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī
tasya sthitvā katham api puraḥ ketakādhānahetor
ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce
yācñā vandhyā varam adhiguṇe nādhame labdhakāmā
saṃtaptānāṃ tvam asi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ
gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ
kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ
na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ
āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailaṃ
kāle kāle bhavati bhavatā yasya saṃyogam etya
mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ
vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas toyagṛdhnuḥ
kartuṃ yac ca prabhavati mahīm ucchilindhrām avandhyaṃ
tac chrutvā te śravaṇasubhagaṃ garjitaṃ mānasotkāḥ
saṃdeśaṃ me tadanu jalada śroṣyasi śrotrapeyam
khinnaḥ khinnaḥ śikhariṣu padaṃ nyasya gantāsi yatra
kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ parilaghu payaḥ srotasāṃ copabhujya
adreḥ śṛṅgaṃ harati pavanaḥ kiṃ svid ity unmukhībhir
yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te
kiṃ cit paścād pravalaya gatiṃ bhūya evottareṇa
prāpte mitre bhavati vimukhaḥ kiṃ punar yas tathoccaiḥ
madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ
bhakticchedair iva viracitāṃ bhūtim aṅge gajasya
antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ
riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya
utpaśyāmi drutam api sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ
pratyudyātaḥ katham api bhavān gantum āśu vyavasyet
gatvā sadyaḥ phalam avikalaṃ kāmukatvasya labdhā
sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi
vakraḥ panthā yad api bhavataḥ prasthitasyottarāśāṃ
lolāpāṅgair yadi na ramase locanair vañcito 'si
strīṇām ādyaṃ praṇayavacanaṃ vibhramo hi priyeṣu
kārśyaṃ yena tyajati vidhinā sa tvayaivopapādyaḥ
śeṣaiḥ puṇyair hṛtam iva divaḥ kāntimat khaṇḍam ekam
bhartuḥ kaṇṭhacchavir iti gaṇaiḥ sādaraṃ dṛśyamāṇaḥ
apy anyasmiñ jaladhara mahākālam āsādya kāle
sthātavyaṃ te nayanaviṣayaṃ yāvad abhyeti bhānuḥ
toyotsargastanitamukharo mā sma bhūr viklavās tāḥ
dṛṣṭe sūrye punar api bhavān vāhayed adhvaśeṣaṃ
śāntiṃ neyaṃ praṇayibhir ato vartma bhānos tyajāśu
tasmāt tasyāḥ kumudaviśadāny arhasi tvaṃ na dhairyān
tasyāḥ kiṃ cit karadhṛtam iva prāptavānīraśākhaṃ
prasthānaṃ te katham api sakhe lambamānasya bhāvi
nīcair vāsyaty upajigamiṣor devapūrvaṃ giriṃ te
atyādityaṃ hutavahamukhe saṃbhṛtaṃ tadd hi tejaḥ
tvayy ādātuṃ jalam avanate śārṅgiṇo varṇacaure
tasyāḥ sindhoḥ pṛthum api tanuṃ dūrabhāvāt pravāham
dhārāpātais tvam iva kamalāny abhyavarṣan mukhāni
kṛtvā tāsām abhigamam apāṃ somya sārasvatīnām
antaḥsvacchas tvam api bhavitā varṇamātreṇa kṛṣṇaḥ
tasyāḥ pātuṃ suragaja iva vyomni pūrvārdhalambī
tvaṃ ced acchasphaṭikaviśadaṃ tarkayes tiryag ambhaḥ
saṃsarpantyā sapadi bhavataḥ srotasi cchāyayā sā
tasyā eva prabhavam acalaṃ prāpya gauraṃ tuṣāraiḥ
ye tvāṃ muktadhvanim asahanāḥ kāyabhaṅgāya tasmin
ke vā na syuḥ paribhavapadaṃ niṣphalārambhayatnāḥ
nirhrādī te muraja iva cet kandarāsu dhvaniḥ syāt
saṃgītārtho nanu paśupates tatra bhāvī samastaḥ
prāleyādrer upataṭam atikramya tāṃs tān viśeṣān
śṛṅgocchrāyaiḥ kumudaviśadair yo vitatya sthitaḥ khaṃ
krīḍāśaile yadi ca viharet pādacāreṇa gaurī
tābhyo mokṣas tava yadi sakhe gharmalabdhasya na syāt
na tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā na punar alakāṃ jñāsyase kāmacārin
yā vaḥ kāle vahati salilodgāram uccairvimānā
prāsādās tvāṃ tulayitum alaṃ yatra tais tair viśeṣaiḥ
sīmante ca tvadupagamajaṃ yatra nīpaṃ vadhūnām
śaṅkāspṛṣṭā iva jalamucas tvādṛśā yatra jālair
naiśo mārgaḥ savitur udaye sūcyate kāminīnām
matvā devaṃ dhanapatisakhaṃ yatra sākṣād vasantaṃ
prāyaś cāpaṃ na vahati bhayān manmathaḥ ṣaṭpadajyam
dūrāl lakṣyaṃ tad amaradhanuś cāruṇā toraṇena
na dhyāsyanti vyapagataśucas tvām api prekṣya haṃsāḥ
madgehinyāḥ priya iti sakhe cetasā kātareṇa
ekaḥ sakhyās tava saha mayā vāmapādābhilāṣī
yām adhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛd vaḥ
sūryāpāye na khalu kamalaṃ puṣyati svām abhikhyām
yā tatra syād yuvativiṣaye sṛṣṭir ādyeva dhātuḥ
tāṃ jānīyāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ
āloke te nipatati purā sā balivyākulā vā
kac cid bhartuḥ smarasi nibhṛte tvaṃ hi tasya priyeti
utsaṅge vā malinavasane somya nikṣipya vīṇāṃ
tantrīr ārdrā nayanasalilaiḥ sārayitvā kathaṃ cid
bhūyo bhūyaḥ svayam api kṛtāṃ mūrcchanāṃ vismarantī
ādye baddhā virahadivase yā śikhā dāma hitvā
savyāpārām ahani na tathā khedayed viprayogaḥ
śaṅke rātrau gurutaraśucaṃ nirvinodāṃ sakhīṃ te
matsaṃdeśaiḥ sukhayitum ataḥ paśya sādhvīṃ niśīthe
nītā rātriḥ kṣaṇa iva mayā sārdham icchāratair yā
sābhre 'hnīva sthalakamalinīṃ na prabuddhāṃ na suptām
jāne sakhyās tava mayi manaḥ saṃbhṛtasneham asmād
vācālaṃ māṃ na khalu subhagaṃmanyabhāvaḥ karoti
pratyakṣaṃ te nikhilam acirād bhrātar uktaṃ mayā yat
tvām apy asraṃ navajalamayaṃ mocayiṣyaty avaśyaṃ
tvayy āsanne nayanam uparispandi śaṅke mṛgākṣyā
tasmin kāle jalada dayitā labdhanidrā yadi syād
mā bhūd asyāḥ praṇayini mayi svapnalabdhe kathaṃ cit
bhartur mitraṃ priyam avidhave viddhi mām ambuvāhaṃ
yo vṛndāni tvarayati pathi śrāmyatāṃ proṣitānāṃ
śroṣyaty asmāt param avahitā somya sīmantinīnāṃ
kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃ cid ūnaḥ
tām āyuṣmān mama ca vacanād ātmanā copakartuṃ
avyāpannaḥ kuśalam abale pṛcchati tvāṃ viyuktaḥ
aṅgenāṅgaṃ tanu ca tanunā gāḍhataptena taptaṃ
saṃkalpais te viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ
śabdākhyeyaṃ yad api kila te yaḥ sakhīnāṃ purastāt
hantaikasthaṃ kva cid api na te bhīru sādṛśyam asti
ātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvad icchāmi kartum
asrais tāvan muhur upacitair dṛṣṭir ālipyate me
krūras tasminn api na sahate saṃgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ
labdhāyās te katham api sati svapnasaṃdarśaneṣu
paśyantīnāṃ na khalu bahuśo na sthalīdevatānāṃ
pūrvaspṛṣṭaṃ yadi kila bhaved aṅgam ebhis taveti
saṃkṣipyeran kṣaṇa iva kathaṃ dīrghayāmās triyāmāḥ
sarvāvasthāsv ahar api kathaṃ mandamandātapaṃ syāt
nanv ātmānaṃ bahu vigaṇayann ātmanā nāvalambe
tat kalyāṇi tvam api sutarāṃ mā gamaḥ kātaratvam
kasyātyantaṃ sukham upanataṃ duḥkham ekāntato vā
nīcair gacchaty upari ca daśā cakranemikrameṇa
māsān anyān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā
paścād āvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tam ātmābhilāṣaṃ
bhūyaś cāha tvam api śayane kaṇṭhalagnā purā me
nidrāṃ gatvā kim api rudatī sasvanaṃ viprabuddhā
sāntarhāsaṃ kathitam asakṛt pṛcchataś ca tvayā me
dṛṣṭaḥ svapne kitava ramayan kām api tvaṃ mayeti
mā kaulīnād asitanayane mayy aviśvāsinī bhūḥ
snehān āhuḥ kim api virahahrāsinas te hy abhogād
kac cit somya vyavasitam idaṃ bandhukṛtyaṃ tvayā me
pratyākhyātuṃ na khalu bhavato dhīratāṃ tarkayāmi
sauhārdād vā vidhura iti vā mayy anukrośabuddhyā
iṣṭān deśān vicara jalada prāvṛṣā saṃbhṛtaśrīr
mā bhūd evaṃ kṣaṇam api ca te vidyutā viprayogaḥ
